attributes.action: To leave the EU after negotiating a trade treaty with the EU
attributes.additional_details: The country has never been given a democratic chance to vote on our continuing membership of the EU.We did vote for a common market and I support that.They will not stop trading with us and therefore as we buy more from them than the EU buys from us we will gain jobs;can expel all those presently able to work here,again reducing unemployment.The UK Parliament will again have sovereignity and the only people to lose their job will be politicians.Before the EU,NATO kept the peace and will continue to do so.
